subject: Baseball
Bull Riding
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Brandon Nimmo, the Mets’ 2011 first-round draft pick, has traded his view of mountains on the horizon in Wyoming for skyscrapers outside his window at a Holiday Inn in Brooklyn.
snippet: Brandon Nimmo, the Mets’ 2011 first-round draft pick, has traded his view of mountains on the horizon in Wyoming for skyscrapers outside his window at a Holiday Inn in Brooklyn.
